---
title: "Stage 2"
---

Single honours students take all six modules listed below. Combined honours students take modules marked \* as well as one 20-credit module per semester in their minor subject.

### Semester 1

PSYC523: Designing and Conducting Research\*

PSYC525: Individual Differences, Social and Developmental Psychology\*

PSYC527: Psychology in Education

### Semester 2

PSYC524: Qualitative and Mixed Methods for Psychology\*

PSYC526: Cognition and Biological Psychology\*

PSYC528: Health and Wellbeing

Note for students in Stage 3 and above: Stage 2 was redesigned for 2025/26. If you studied Stage 2 before this year then you will have taken a different set of modules.
